document.full_text: there was a time when a gluten-free diet meant giving up favorite foods, ranging from pasta to birthday cake. now, a slew of new gluten-free bakeries, cooking products and cookbooks can help bakers navigate a gluten-free kitchen.
document.title: guide to a gluten-free kitchen
lines_and_colors: there was a time when a gluten-free diet meant giving up favorite foods, ranging from pasta to birthday cake. now, a slew of new gluten-free bakeries, cooking products and cookbooks can help bakers navigate a gluten-free kitchen.
